item.title: Building a Hugo Theme
item.description: I’ve built a Hugo theme, yBlog, for my personal blog. Here are some take-aways. Mental model As a content writer, we write contents in markdown, put them in correct folders, add some meta-data in front matter, and that’s it. Hugo takes care of everything else for us.
